2061770.name: Pop Pixie: Mission Training
2061770.description:
The Mentoes Corporation is plotting something, and whatever it is, it can't be good. Looks like Pop Pixie's mission to infiltrate the Mentoes Tower will have to go ahead sooner than planned. It's time for him to load up his weapon and polish his skills in Amanda's jury-rigged Mission Training simulation. The only problem: He's already failed the simulation 172 times, and time is running out.

This demo is a short prequel to the main game. It guides you through the game's main mechanics, such as fighting enemies, rolling through obstacles, and searching for clues to bring the Mentoes Corporation's dark secrets to light. There are five short levels, including a boss fight against a holographic simulation of Mr Mentoe himself.
2061770.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
